issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Use the default MR scratch directory (HDFS) in the only case when hive.blobstore.optimizations.enabled=true AND isFinalJob=true

comments.body:
[~rajesh.balamohan] Could you please look at it?

[~zhihao] I saw your [comment|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-15121?focusedCommentId=16180458&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-16180458] on HIVE-15121. Do you think that this modification will solve the problem?

ATTACHMENT ID: 12892063 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

+1 think the new methods makes much more sense than the previous ones
the failure of itests/hive-blobstore/src/test/results/clientpositive/write_final_output_blobstore.q.out seems to be caused by the fix: the move operator's source is now a staging path
pushed to master. Thank you [~ghajos] for fixing this!
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
